title: Manage Pinned Projects
description: Drag projects to adjust their order in the navigation bar. The order will be saved automatically. Click the delete button to unpin projects.

empty.title: No pinned projects
empty.description: Click the Pin button on project detail pages to add projects to the navigation bar

confirm.unpin: Are you sure you want to unpin this project?

messages.pinLimitReached: Maximum 10 projects can be pinned. Please unpin some projects first
